name: openade
description: TypeScript libraries for Italian Agenzia delle Entrate electronic fiscal receipts

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix examples/pem && npm install --prefix examples/pel && npm install --prefix examples/fe
scripts.install:examples: npm install --prefix examples/pem && npm install --prefix examples/pel && npm install --prefix examples/fe
scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:pem && npm run build:pel && npm run build:fe
scripts.update:all: npm run update && npm run update:workspaces
scripts.start:pem: npm run build && cd examples/pem && npm start
scripts.start:pel: npm run build && cd examples/pel && npm start
scripts.start:fe: npm run build && cd examples/fe && npm start
scripts.dev:pem: npm run build && cd examples/pem && npm run dev
scripts.dev:pel: npm run build && cd examples/pel && npm run dev
scripts.dev:fe: npm run build && cd examples/fe && npm run dev
